Package ibo1.Application

Class Main

java.lang.Object
javafx.application.Application
ibo1.Application.Main
public class Main extends javafx.application.Application
Main - Is the starting point of the User Interface. It is the connection point between the backend and the frontend. It will initialize variables and set up the first javafx scene and call it

It is used to create an instance of the application by using other class instances. Interactive Robot Chess Server, which is run within a ROS system on a Linux machine.

Version:
0.1 ( Initial development )., 1.0 ( Initial release ).
Author:
Omar Ibrahim

    • stop

      public void stop()
      This is called when the JavaFX window closes. It sends a close command to the ROS system. Further deals with some exception handling.
